snippet.title: Myst gameplay (PC Game, 1993)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Myst, PC game produced by Cyan in 1993 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/myst/10773/
Playing the beginning of this epic adventure. Solving a few puzzles that are getting more complicated and interesting as the game goes by.
Played through emulated Windows (Win 98/Win XP) virtual machine.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Gabriel Knight - https://youtu.be/BM0Kh1Z5gcc
Last Half of Darkness II - https://youtu.be/DhYRmSam7Go
Plan 9 from Outer Space - https://youtu.be/Q5rCT7zoPoA
